name: Project in Pathobiology
description: A self-contained research project to be completed under the supervision of a faculty member. The main areas of research are as listed in the description of the Department (above). The student will normally have completed three full years of study, and is expected to devote at least one full day per week to the project. Admission is by arrangement with the Department and with a particular supervisor. A list of potential supervisors is available from the Departmental Office and on our web site. Not eligible for CR/NCR option.
prerequisites: BCH210H1/BCH242Y1, LMP300Y1/LMP363H1/LMP365H1 and permission of department
